ack.p: This research was funded by the Engineer Research and Development Center, Environmental Laboratory, Ecosystem Management and Restoration Research Program (Technical Director: Dr. Alfred Cofrancesco; Program Manager: Mr. Glenn Rhett). Robert McComas and Craig Fischenich were instrumental in coordinating this research effort. We thank Rachel L. Haug, Lawrence H. Ives, and John H. Haynes (US Army Corps of Engineers, Norfolk District) for their assistance in preparing this manuscript. Russell Burke of Christopher Newport University provided comments on the draft manuscript.
